data.what_is: MindFires is an automation software with easy-to-use drag-and-drop applications that allows print and marketing professionals to create highly personalized marketing workflows, orchestrate direct mail, email, mobile and social media, automate drip-and-nurture sequences, and track performance with comprehensive analytics.
data.product_description: MindFires is an automation software with easy-to-use drag-and-drop applications that allows print and marketing professionals to create highly personalized marketing workflows, orchestrate direct mail, email, mobile and social media, automate drip-and-nurture sequences, and track performance with comprehensive analytics.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MindFire, Inc.?
In my company, we use it primarily for e-mail campaigns. It provides a direct correlation to a print piece. The main reason why we choose MindFire is that it is correlated with direct mail. Capabilities to use for a variety of campaigns: Event marketing, lead generation, customer loyalty, digital marketing,...

What do you dislike about MindFire, Inc.?
The UI is outdated and needs to be updated. The ability to delete elements after publishing and going back to edit mode. Better UX needs to be implemented for a better experience.

What problems is MindFire, Inc. solving and how is that benefiting you?
It doesn't allow for the good scalability of campaigns. While the templates are descent, you do need some coding knowledge to make these campaigns web compliant. MindFire has a great support team which provides support at any time.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about MindFire, Inc.?
review_question_answers.answer: In my company, we use it primarily for e-mail campaigns. It provides a direct correlation to a print piece. The main reason why we choose MindFire is that it is correlated with direct mail. Capabilities to use for a variety of campaigns: Event marketing, lead generation, customer loyalty, digital marketing,...

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about MindFire, Inc.?
review_question_answers.answer: The UI is outdated and needs to be updated. The ability to delete elements after publishing and going back to edit mode. Better UX needs to be implemented for a better experience.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is MindFire, Inc. solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: It doesn't allow for the good scalability of campaigns. While the templates are descent, you do need some coding knowledge to make these campaigns web compliant. MindFire has a great support team which provides support at any time.

initial_reviews.review_title: Rapid fire for Email Marketing through Mindfire Studio
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MindFire, Inc.?
Easy to use UI for direct email campaigns, the drag and drop features made it simple to achieve simple tasks.

What do you dislike about MindFire, Inc.?
The other competitors have moved on with their UI and the UI looks obsolete (but it is also simple to use). The UI could have incorporated more modern features to allow better scaling of the campaign for instance the use of tags.

What problems is MindFire, Inc. solving and how is that benefiting you?
We had used Mindfire Studio for one of our clients a year back for their email marketing campaign.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about MindFire, Inc.?
review_question_answers.answer: Easy to use UI for direct email campaigns, the drag and drop features made it simple to achieve simple tasks.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about MindFire, Inc.?
review_question_answers.answer: The other competitors have moved on with their UI and the UI looks obsolete (but it is also simple to use). The UI could have incorporated more modern features to allow better scaling of the campaign for instance the use of tags.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is MindFire, Inc. solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We had used Mindfire Studio for one of our clients a year back for their email marketing campaign.

initial_reviews.review_title: MindFire for all your marketing automation needs
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MindFire, Inc.?
Very easy-to-use drag-and-drop applications that make automation much more accessible.
The interface is really handy which makes the experience awesome and simple.

What do you dislike about MindFire, Inc.?
Sometimes finding the target audiences is challenging which results in lowering the effectiveness of the campaign, as well as the whole project hence causing disruption in services.

Recommendations to others considering MindFire, Inc.:
Add some more features to target specific audiences.

What problems is MindFire, Inc. solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use MindFire, Inc. for marketing automation, most of the internal data were used for the automation purpose some problems arise such as having not enough data but the MindFire audience selection makes it a benefit.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about MindFire, Inc.?
review_question_answers.answer:
Very easy-to-use drag-and-drop applications that make automation much more accessible.
The interface is really handy which makes the experience awesome and simple.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about MindFire, Inc.?
review_question_answers.answer: Sometimes finding the target audiences is challenging which results in lowering the effectiveness of the campaign, as well as the whole project hence causing disruption in services.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering MindFire, Inc.:
review_question_answers.answer: Add some more features to target specific audiences.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is MindFire, Inc. solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We use MindFire, Inc. for marketing automation, most of the internal data were used for the automation purpose some problems arise such as having not enough data but the MindFire audience selection makes it a benefit.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MindFire, Inc.?
Very easy to use Drag and Drop Automation
The interface is handy
Creating automation is very simple

What do you dislike about MindFire, Inc.?
Preset templates are very confusing
Finding the right targeting user's is challenging sometimes

What problems is MindFire, Inc. solving and how is that benefiting you?

Creation of the marketing automations
Engaging right audience with the products

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MindFire, Inc.?
It's easy for customers to sign your document with the help of CocoSign. They can upload it here, enter form fields with their contact details, and then send it back electronically.

What do you dislike about MindFire, Inc.?
One of the downsides of preset templates is that they can be confusing at first. Once you load them up they work great, but it takes time to find them.

What problems is MindFire, Inc. solving and how is that benefiting you?
Ease of use and good value for the price.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about MindFire, Inc.?
review_question_answers.answer: It's easy for customers to sign your document with the help of CocoSign. They can upload it here, enter form fields with their contact details, and then send it back electronically.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about MindFire, Inc.?
review_question_answers.answer: One of the downsides of preset templates is that they can be confusing at first. Once you load them up they work great, but it takes time to find them.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is MindFire, Inc. solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Ease of use and good value for the price.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MindFire, Inc.?
Multi-channel Moptiulti-touch Marketing Campaign, Lead Nurturing, Lead Generation helped me a lot.

What do you dislike about MindFire, Inc.?
The current software is self-sufficient no drawbacks

What problems is MindFire, Inc. solving and how is that benefiting you?
It has helped me with lead generation.

review_question_answers.answer: Multi-channel Moptiulti-touch Marketing Campaign, Lead Nurturing, Lead Generation helped me a lot.

review_question_answers.answer: The current software is self-sufficient no drawbacks

review_question_answers.question: What problems is MindFire, Inc. solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: It has helped me with lead generation.

initial_reviews.review_title: Not to bad if you use Print & PURL
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MindFire, Inc.?
It provides easy to use PURL, you might not need to learn coding in order to use MindFire.

What do you dislike about MindFire, Inc.?
The interface is not much user-friendly and good-looking. it could be improved

Recommendations to others considering MindFire, Inc.:
It's a nice and easy tool, But do not expect much out of it from the interface especially.

What problems is MindFire, Inc. solving and how is that benefiting you?
Used to send emails and creation of PURLs.
It provides direct correlation to printing piece

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MindFire, Inc.?
MindFire is basically doing all the work that will take money and time to complete, finding you the right targeted leads specifically to your audience, it helps you do more work in a short space of time

What do you dislike about MindFire, Inc.?
We still love the old way of doing things ourselves and be hands-on with the work we do

Recommendations to others considering MindFire, Inc.:
I would advise a lot of companies to start using MindFire to generate the success that they want from their company and more

What problems is MindFire, Inc. solving and how is that benefiting you?
finding the right leads for my company, and having people engage in my products, that way I know exactly what my audience is experiencing

review_question_answers.answer: I would advise a lot of companies to start using MindFire to generate the success that they want from their company and more

review_question_answers.question: What problems is MindFire, Inc. solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: finding the right leads for my company, and having people engage in my products, that way I know exactly what my audience is experiencing
